Scripts AI Lessons

File Operations Best Practices

  • Use ESModules import/export for better tree-shaking and modern JavaScript support
  • Handle file permissions explicitly when creating executable files
  • Always include try/catch blocks for filesystem operations
  • Use async/await for asynchronous operations when possible

CI Integration Patterns

  • Detect CI environment using process.env.CI
  • Use proper exit codes to control CI pipeline flow
  • Implement clear console logging with emojis for better visibility
  • Handle edge cases and provide fallback behaviors

Documentation Automation

  • Keep templates minimal but informative
  • Use consistent HTML structure across documentation
  • Include basic CSS for better readability
  • Automate documentation updates where possible
